page.title: 09GOVERNMENT IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: Noth west section lies within Ebrington Parish boundary,north & south east section within Chipping Campden Parish and 3 south west sections come into Blockley Parish. Cotswold District Council,Cirencester controls housing,refuse collecting, allocation of council houses and collection of rents and rates,assess -ment of housing benefits and rate relief.Highway maintenance is the responsibility of Gloucestershire County Council.Water and sewerage are divided between the Thames Water Board and the Severn & Trent Water Board. Parliamentary Representation:- Constituency: Cirencester & District. Member: Mr.Nicholas Ridley M.P. Euro Member: Sir Henry Plumb.
